SELECT
FROM goods g WHERE 1 = 1 AND g.shop_id = #{shopId} AND g.is_deleted = 0 AND g.status = 1 ORDER BY g.onshelf_time DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT
FROM goods g WHERE 1 = 1 AND g.shop_id = #{shopId} AND g.is_deleted = 0 AND g.status = 1 ORDER BY g.sequence IS NULL, g.sequence ASC, g.onshelf_time is null, g.onshelf_time DESC, g.created_time DESC
SELECT MAX(price) FROM goods_sku gs WHERE 1 = 1 AND gs.goods_id = #{goodsId} AND gs.is_deleted = 0
SELECT MAX(refer_price) FROM goods_sku gs WHERE 1 = 1 AND gs.goods_id = #{goodsId} AND gs.is_deleted = 0

SELECT ge.content, ge.goods_score AS score, ge.imgs AS evalImgs, u.nickname AS userNickname, u.avatar AS userAvatar FROM goods_evaluate ge LEFT JOIN user u ON ge.user_id = u.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ge.goods_id = #{goodsId} AND ge.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY ge.goods_score, ge.created_time DESC LIMIT 1
